last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Clothes have been delivered anonymously for Sara. Worried in case her cruel treatment of Sara may be discovered, Miss Minchin has mellowed.

name: A Little Princess
overview: Based upon the novel A Little Princess by Frances Hodgson Burnett.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The daughter of an Indian Army officer comes to school in London.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Sara is a pupil at Miss Minchin's seminary in London. Her father has returned to India.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sara's father has died, penniless, and Miss Minchin tells Sara she is no longer a pupil but must work in the kitchen.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Sara's attic has become a meeting-place for Becky and Ermengarde. A gentleman from India has moved in next door.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Carrisford has hired Carmichael to help him find Crewe's daughter. Little do they know that a word with Sara and their search would be over.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Clothes have been delivered anonymously for Sara. Worried in case her cruel treatment of Sara may be discovered, Miss Minchin has mellowed.
